alert.note: Alert for Portage; Waupaca; Waushara; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 4:49PM CDT until April 12 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Green Bay has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Wood County in central Wisconsin... Portage County in central Wisconsin... Waushara County in central Wisconsin... Western Waupaca County in northeastern Wisconsin... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 449 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Wazeecha, or 7 miles southeast of Wisconsin Rapids, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stevens Point, Wisconsin Rapids, Waupaca, Wautoma, Redgranite, Whiting, Amherst, Plainfield, Napowan Scout Camp and Hartman Creek State Park. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
